overview: Circle of Friends is a DVD by Bob Mould of a live concert recorded in 2005 at the 9:30 Club in Washington, D.C. The performance included songs from Mould's earlier bands H端sker D端 and Sugar, as well as his solo work. This particular show was part of the Body of Song tour, Mould's first non-solo tour for over a decade and the first one in which H端sker D端 material was played for the first time since the band broke up in 1988.
title: Bob Mould: Circle of Friends
